content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Maryam,

Let's negotiate the price. I am looking for the highest possible rent for my apartment. Please make your first offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because seeking the lowest price for rental contradicts my goal in this scenario.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
